title: Wouldn't it be awesome if Jhin's Dancing Grenade change pitch whenever you kill more target?
body:
Jhin Main here

Just thinking about it makes me feel Jhinister

More target Q kill=More Q Damage =Increasing pitch

Of course the pitch progression would be a diminishing cord or minor cord. To create an eerie and artistic feeling. 

Would be a huge improvement from the current static coin sound. Also improve the clarity of his abilities, players will feel satisfied dealing higher damage with the higher pitch.

"I can not be good, I must be PERFECTION!" --Jhin, 2016

replies.body: We played with this.  But it ended up creating performance issues I believe.  (I'm not the sound guy)

Darn. That would've been a really good thematic thing to have. Oh well, we can always just make the noise ourselves I guess?

-Picturing pro players playing Jhin and making "Do Do Do" noises-
